# iosxr_aaa_authentication (Resource)

This resource can manage the AAA Authentication configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_aaa_authentication" "example" {
  login = [
    {
      list      = "AAA-LIST"
      a1_tacacs = true
      a2_radius = true
      a3_group  = "AAA3"
      a4_local  = true
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `login` (Attributes List) List name for AAA authentication (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--login))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--login"></a>
### Nested Schema for `login`

Required:

- `list` (String) List name for AAA authentication

Optional:

- `a1_group` (String) server-group name
- `a1_line` (Boolean) Use line password for authentication
- `a1_local` (Boolean) Use local password for authentication
- `a1_radius` (Boolean) Use list of all RADIUS hosts
- `a1_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a2_group` (String) server-group name
- `a2_line` (Boolean) Use line password for authentication
- `a2_local` (Boolean) Use local password for authentication
- `a2_radius` (Boolean) Use list of all RADIUS hosts
- `a2_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a3_group` (String) server-group name
- `a3_line` (Boolean) Use line password for authentication
- `a3_local` (Boolean) Use local password for authentication
- `a3_radius` (Boolean) Use list of all RADIUS hosts
- `a3_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a4_group` (String) server-group name
- `a4_line` (Boolean) Use line password for authentication
- `a4_local` (Boolean) Use local password for authentication
- `a4_radius` (Boolean) Use list of all RADIUS hosts
- `a4_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_aaa_authentication.example ""
```
